data.description: Interface to libbtt BitTorrent Tracker lib
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Net::BitTorrent::LibBTT is part of libbtt, which in turn is part of
    the mod_bt distribution. It allows people running a mod_bt (or other
    libbtt-based tracker, but no others exist yet) tracker to access and
    manipulate details on the operation of that tracker.
